title: (need help) Mouse click not working

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
anytime i left click whit the mouse it doesn't click where i want it to click but somewhere off to the right.
the problem goes away when i turn down the resolution of the game and put it into window mode.
in the pics provided ive marked in red where im clicking whit my mouse the 3rd pic is how things should look and act.

if anyone can help it would be great.

replies.body:
This looks like a bad config that's failing to respond to your inputs.  Try a config reset to see if that fixes the issue.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps!
it didnt work out i still had the same problem but i changed some of the setting and i found a configuration that suits me fine :) thanks anyway though
